title: Part 272 - Retail Food Sales
content:
Part 272 - Retail Food Sales

State Regulations

Subpart 272-1 - Meat for Sale at Retail (ยง 272-1.1 to 272-1.16)

Subpart 272-2 - Advertising and Marketing of Food for Sale at Retail (ยง 272-2.1 to 272-2.4)

Subpart 272-3 - Sale of Small Quantities of Prepackaged Fresh Fruits and Vegetables (ยง 272-3.1 to 272-3.3)

Subpart 272-4 - Sale of Seafood, Fish, Meat and Poultry in Frozen State (ยง 272-4.1 to 272-4.3)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
